name: Fruit Hunt
description:
Fruit Hunt is a casual fun filled satisfying feel good game to play. You will be given a pistol in the beginning to make the fruits explode. You have four more guns to unlock. This will be a relaxing game that can make your mind feel good. Kids would love the cool sound effects that make them play the game again.

By purchasing the game once you will get access to both the android and pc version which is cool so grab them without thinking twice.

Follow our profile for the fun filled gaming experience

beatfiregames.itch.io
